hero.title: Clinical Research Coordinator
hero.subtitle: Leading healthcare innovation through clinical trial management and AI-based digital therapeutics research. Managing a multi-center R&D project worth 390 million KRW at the Department of Rehabilitation Medicine, International St. Mary's Hospital.

about.title: Philosophy & Approach
about.description1: I believe the future of healthcare lies at the intersection of rigorous clinical validation and adaptive AI. With a background in nursing and clinical research, I ensure new technologies are not only cutting-edge but also clinically meaningful and patient-centered.
about.description2: Currently working as a Clinical Research Coordinator at International St. Mary's Hospital, designing strategies to accelerate drug development and improve patient outcomes through digital biomarkers and decentralized clinical trial methodologies.
